original_text: on his legs he wore bronze greaves, and a bronze javelin was slung on his back.
korean_text: 그의 다리에는 놋 각반을 쳤고 어깨 사이에는 놋 단창을 메었으니

sentences.original_text: on his legs he wore bronze greaves
and a bronze javelin was slung on his back
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 등에는 청동 투창이 메어져 있었다
